content.raw:
I don't think it needs to be in the doxygen.

In order for non-GUI plugins to change UserCamera values, I think the UserCamera would need to subscribe to transport messages.
content.html:
I don't think it needs to be in the doxygen.

In order for non-GUI plugins to change UserCamera values, I think the UserCamera would need to subscribe to transport messages.
